app.search-label: What do you want to read?
footer.title: The Noble Quran
footer.description: Read, study, and learn The Noble Quran. Quran.com is a Sadaqah Jariyah.
footer.paragraph: We hope to make it easy for everyone to read, study, and learn The Noble Quran. The Noble Quran has many names including Al-Quran Al-Kareem, Al-Ketab, Al-Furqan, Al-Maw'itha, Al-Thikr, and Al-Noor.
